notes: Gauge windows (power, draft, pace, heart rate)
Bug fixes for disappearing overview window
Optimized Zwift login and API usage

notes.html: Restore core functionality following the July 2022 protocol changes
children: Switch from packet sniffing to full game client implementation
A second Zwift login is required to avoid duplicate connection detection. It does not need to be a paid account and you can use an alias email such as, myemail+sauce@gmail.com.
The game will prompt you for both logins as needed.

notes: Added debug logging file (sauce.log) and window (Debug Logs)
Added connection pooling for reduced latency
Handle reconnecting expired sessions to Zwift relay servers
Support for recovering from network outages
Added log file rotation a la., sauce.log.1, sauce.log.2, etc.
Added Button in Device Logs window to open the log folder directly
Increased verbosity of Game Monitor status for diagnostics
